# CapturedRoom.Confidence

**Enumeration**

Levels of certainty in the classification of a particular detail in a scan.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Confidence
```

## Overview

The framework chooses a level of certainty in its assessment of particular room features, such as:

- The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface/confidence] in a [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface/category-swift.property] that the captured room assigns its surfaces, such as [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/doors], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/openings], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/walls], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/windows].
- The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Object/confidence] in a [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Object/category-swift.property] that the captured room assigns its [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/objects].

## Assessing a confidence value

- **CapturedRoom.Confidence.high**: A confidence value that represents a high level of certainty.
- **CapturedRoom.Confidence.medium**: A confidence value that represents a medium level of certainty.
- **CapturedRoom.Confidence.low**: A confidence value that represents a low level of certainty.

## Inspecting room details

- **identifier**: A unique alphanumeric value that the framework assigns the room.
- **story**: The story, floor number, or level on which the captured room resides within a larger structure.
- **floors**: An array of floors that the framework identifies during a scan.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface**: A 2D area in a room that the framework identifies as a surface.
- **doors**: An array of doors that the framework identifies during a scan.
- **objects**: An array of objects that the framework identifies during a scan.
- **CapturedRoom.Object**: A 3D area in a room that the framework identifies as an object.
- **openings**: An array of openings that the framework identifies during a scan.
- **walls**: An array of walls that the framework identifies during a scan.
- **windows**: An array of windows that the framework identifies during a scan.
- **sections**: One or more room types that the framework observes in the room.
- **CapturedRoom.Section**: An object that identifies a particular area in a captured room in relation to common types of room areas in a building.
- **version**: A version number for the captured room.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
